# Data & Methods

```{r message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
data_url <- "https://github.com/mickaeltemporao/CMT4A-CMSS-TEMPLATE/raw/main/data/clean_2016.rds"
clean_data <- readRDS(url(data_url,"rb"))
```

```{r}

ggplot(clean_data, aes(x=ideology)) +
  geom_bar()

ggplot(clean_data, aes(x=income)) +
  geom_bar()

```

# Results

